p: Samples of the ingredients and refusals were dried in a forced-ventilation oven at 55°C for 72 h and ground in a Wiley mill (Tecnal, Piracicaba, São Paulo, Brasil) with a 1-mm screen. Fecal samples were also ground with a 3.0-mm screen and analyzed according to the AOAC [ 17] methods to assess the dry matter (DM; method 967.03), ash (method 942.05), crude protein (CP; method 981.10), and ether extract (EE; method 920.29) contents.
